thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com | 5 of 112
thread.title: Shauna Toerner

author: Shauna Toerner
title: Shauna Toerner
text: I've been using ezCater for a couple years now. I place an average of 6 orders a week and they are always so helpful! On top of that, the website is easy to navigate and if you live in the right areas, there's a great selection to choose from. There's always someone available in case I need to change an order last minute. It's my go to website for placing any and almost all of my catering orders.
